title: MarQ By Flipkart Innoview 80 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED Smart Android TV  (32AAHDM)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Television Set, Remote Control, Wallmount Stand, 2 AAA Batteries, Desktop Stand, Stand Support Screws, Quick Start Guide
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Eros Now, Sony Live, Hungama, Zee5
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience.The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Retina-safe Technology: Whether you’re binge-watching your favourite series or your kids are watching their favourite cartoons for a longer time, don’t stress about eye strain. The customized Picture Tuning settings offer an optimal combination of brightness and contrast levels. Dedicated ‘Energy Mode’ results in reduced emittance of harmful rays from the TV panel.
product_description.Distortion-free, Powerful Surround Sound: Turn up the volume without worrying about noise crackling or shrill voices, as the Total Harmonic Distortion is less than 1%. Get ready for home-theatre-like experience thanks to the Dolby Audio, Surround Sound and powerful 20 W speakers.

review:
The TV is good.
But does not contain smart remote.
Hence, you can not operate Google assistant mic from the remote given with TV. You need to buy another smart remote to operate mic functions which are very necessary to search any anything, because typing using remote is very difficult.
Since the TV is smart the remote provided should also need to be smart otherwise what is the purpose of smart features in the TV while we can not use them with the provided non smart remote.
Else other things regarding the TV are quite good.
Infact according to the price TV is very good.

Okay it is not a biased review I'm writing this after using 10 Days and Picture is awesome, Sound quality is also awesome and Android also works perfectly....But I have tried to connect my CPU to use it as a monitor but it didn't work so if you are thinking to use it as a monitor then don't buy. After all everything is perfect installation was on time. Go without hesitation at this price. You will not find better TV than this at this price. Marq products are just awesome

This is the 3rd tv i have bought for my family. This is one of the prefect models in budget range. It costed me 16.5k during sale. Overall experience is great. Wifi connectivity is mind blowing. Works with google account.
The only cons i found is that sound is not very great. It decent though.

If you are looking for a budget smart tv with 43 inch screen size then go for it without any second thought.

Humble request DO NOT BUY at any cost.

Poor service by Flipkart and Jeeves.

Flipkart not providing the solution.

Jeeves engineers very indiscipline .

Not sanitized.

Poor performance of the product.

You will not return the product though you raised the request within 10 days also.

Honestly please ask me if you are looking for this product.

I will rate this product 0.5 rating out of 5.


Please please and please JUST ONE WORD DO NOT BUY.......

PLEASE SPEND YOUR MONEY WITH OTHER BRAND BUT NOT WITH FLIPKART.

FEEL FREE TO REACH OUT TO ME IF REQUIRE MORE DETAILS.
Overall good experience with this TV. Using from 15 days. As of now no issue. Seems like worth of the value.
Picture quality is good but connectivity and remote senses are too low. Google voice search doesn't work at all you have to type. But good deal at 15k price.

Picture quality is good and sharp
Sound quality is really poor.. 20W is fine but clarity is not there.. bass is completely missing.
The remote does not support voice command as it is not bluetooth which is promoted wrongly... u can only type ur commands but google assistant wont work as TV does not recognise and connect ur remote in add accessories option.
Bluetooth function is very poor and when i connect a bluetooth device, it does not work properly with youtube.. so u are forced to use only TV speakers.
It is a typical chinese TV labeled as MarQ with nothing great.
U can get the same quality non branded chinese TV for a cheaper price...
Else spend some more money and buy branded TV

Bought marq TV in January. Display panel is not working within 6 months (June24).Warranty service personal came and took all the details and confirmed led panel change or TV replacement in 7-8 working days. Following up with flipcart cart marq team since then. First they confirmed that the TV will be replaced and they are waiting for approval from flipcart authority. Now after almost 20 days they are saying the request is rejected by their concerned team. What a poor service. Gone for this brand as it is flipcart owned brand. Now feeling the big mistake taken.
Atleast hoping the issue is solved soon.

Overall I liked the TV .. connectivity is great .. but there are some issue which I can live. Overall experience of getting the TV and then having the person install it was very good. Picture quality is just great if you are watching a HD video. Wifi, Bluetooth all function seamlessly. At this rate it's a bargain.

Sound is one issue ... It does not get loud enough i.e. if I am listening to a video which was recorded with low sound the max volume of the TV is not loud enough. I need to use an external speaker. I have another brand 32 inch TV and the same video when played on it has a slightly higher sound and I don't need to use external speakers

In-built Chromecasting is not easy. It takes a bit of time to connect and there after the video and audio is choppy ... I have a separate Chromecast device which I use when needed

The 3.5 mm headphone out port works but the issue is when I connect a speaker I hear the sound only through the speaker I don't get it in the TV and external speakers. But my 32 inch TV gets sound through both ... Bluetooth speakers work flawlessly.

HDMI connectivity to laptop does not work properly for all laptops. It works on my Asus when connected but my Lenovo when connected the taskbar flows out of the screen .. unable to change resolution of laptop. Still trying if I find a way I will put it here

An annoying factor I noticed in the TV playing from USB. It works well but my personal issue is it does not support subtitles or SRT files even if they are in the same folder as the video. So I am stuck with playing these videos on laptop
Awesome except connectivity with cpu via hdmi

***LED PANEL DAMAGED WITHIN 8 MONTHS OF USAGE***

Editing my review after usage of 8 months. The LED panel went bad. There is a horizontal line at the middle of the screen. Technician came and asked to get it replaced. I have never seen a TV panel going for a toss within 8 months. Serious quality issue.

My Advice- Please go for a better TV. It may be not budget friendly initially like this, but will work for years to come. I repent buying this.

Excellent TV, definitely worth the price paid.
Pros:
1) Great picture quality
2) Response time of the remote, keypad quality (Bluetooth enabled, hence same remote also works with Fire TV stick)
3) Android UI is user friendly
4) 3x HDMI ports, 2 USB ports (more than sufficient)
5) Sound Quality (to my surprise is really good, though other reviews were stating the opposite)
6) Cast feature works super smooth with Google Home app
Cons:
1) Energy rating is 1star
2) Poor quality of wall mounts provided

After sales service was great, installation was done the very next day by a trained Jeeves professional.
Overall a great deal, worth the price paid.. Ive been using it for a week now and I have absolutely no complaints
Very good product, picture quality is awesome
